========================
Subscripts with XI/BOI
========================

# Subscript attached to tanru unit; BOI optional

lo klama xi 2 klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla) (subscript (xi) (number))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla))))))

# With BOI present

lo klama xi 3 boi klama
---
(source_file
  (statement (sumti (lo) (sumti_tail (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla) (subscript (xi) (number) (boi))))) (selbri (tanru_unit (brivla))))))
